metadata.title: CVE-2016-9645 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The fix for ikiwiki for CVE-2016-10026 was incomplete resulting in editingrestriction bypass for git revert when using git versions older than 2.8.0.This has been fixed in 3.20161229.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
